name: Inner Demons
text: Give to the Bruce Banner player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - If you are Bruce Banner, discard 2 cards from your hand. Discard this obligation. - If you are Hulk, exhaust your hero. Discard this obligation.

flavor: "Foolish rabble! Your pitiful display is nothing to my newfound power!"
name: Abomination
text: Forced Response: After Abomination attacks you, discard the top card of your deck. If a [physical] resource was discarded this way, take 2 damage.

name: Total Destruction
text: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while Abomination is in play.

name: Clash Of The Titans
text: When Revealed: The enemy with the highest ATK attacks the hero or ally with the highest ATK (first player decides ties.) If no attack was made this way, this card gains surge.
